c74object.name: abc.mc.harmo~
c74object.description: abc.mc.harmo~ provides a multichannel harmonizer. There are n parallel harmonizers, each having its own input and own output.

method.name: transK
method.description: sets the Kth transposition value of the Kth harmonizer in midicents [init=0, min=-2400, max=2400, step=0.001].
method.digest: sets the Kth transposition value of the Kth harmonizer in midicents

method.name: gainK
method.description: sets the Kth gain of the Kth harmonizer in dB [init=0, min=-127, max=18, step=0.001].
method.digest: sets the Kth gain of the Kth harmonizer in dB

method.name: winsizeK
method.description: sets the Kth window size of the Kth harmonizer [init=50, min=-0, max=127, step=0.001].
method.digest: sets the Kth window size of the Kth harmonizer
